name: Leilani and the White Lily
description:
Sickness is spreading throughout the world. Feeling lost as her grandfather falls ill, a young girl finds hope in a book containing information about a particular flower that can heal all. Join Leilani in her quest to find said flower deep within the forest.

The story follows Leilani's quest to find the white lily hidden deep in the forest. What will you decide to do?

This game was initially made during the NaNoRenO 2023 game jam, which is to create a visual novel over the course of a month. 

  • 2 endings
  • 25-30 minutes of gameplay

The game at its current released state has limited extra features and will be expanded to include additional content

Coding and Project Management: Amaan https://theaman.itch.io/

Character Art : Michelle Furlong (MiFuWorks)  https://mifuworks.itch.io/ 

Cover and Background Art: Retroknight RKportfiolio (rkportfolio.carrd.co)

Music: lisamichele  https://lisamichele.itch.io/

UI Art: Abbeylily
